about_the_game:
• Gather clues about your father's disappearance while uncovering dark family secrets. Each interaction reveals new layers of mystery.

  • Three beautiful women to interact with through a complete dialogue system.

  • Build bonds of trust or succumb to temptation with three unique women, each with their own hidden motives. Your decisions will affect not only your pleasures but your fate.

  • Elaborate puzzle design.

  • Solve environment-based enigmas using logic, observation, and collected items. No random solutions - each puzzle has meaningful context.

  • Multiple simultaneous objectives for you to progress.

  • Your decisions matter: Choose who to trust, which secrets to keep, and how far you'll go in search of the truth.

  • Realistic 3D environments.

  • Amazing 3D character animations in all kinds of sexual fantasies.

  • Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted 1988 setting, filled with period-accurate details and growing psychological tension.

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit and frequent depictions of sexual acts, full nudity, and ejaculation. Sexual content and themes, including implied pseudo-incestuous situations between step-family members.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Multi-core 1.6 GHz or faster Intel or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

name: Tenebris Legion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Multi-core 1.6GHz or faster 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a first-person adventure where your father left two years ago with a new wife and family. Now he's disappeared. As a young FBI trainee, you visit his remote house seeking answers. Get close to your stepmother and her two daughters while uncovering family secrets in this adult thriller.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
